title: Did Wikileaks Release a List of Black Money Holders in Swiss Bank?
subtitle: A message is viral with the claim that WikiLeaks has published the “first list of black money holders in SWISS bank.” The message mentions top 30 members which includes Sonia Gandhi, Manmohan Singh, Akhilesh Yadav, Shashi Tharoor, among others.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A message is being circulated on social media with the claim that WikiLeaks has published the “first list of black money holders in SWISS bank”.

The message mentions top 30 members which includes Sonia Gandhi, Manmohan Singh, Akhilesh Yadav, Shashi Tharoor, Mayawati among others. It also alleges that Indian black money in Swiss bank amounts to Rs 1.3 trillion dollars.

Several social media users shared the message on Facebook and Twitter with the same claim.
